price: "Yoo kan funaannattan taataniif oyruu keessan irratti bariifadhaa" (waliin jedhan).
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
